plugins.name: kubevirt
plugins.description: Core KubeVirt workflows for VM lifecycle debugging and component analysis

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Lint a path and generate a plan to fix issues with separate commits per linter

commands.description: Review local branch changes using KubeVirt project best practices

plugins.description: A generic utilities plugin serving as a catch-all for various helper commands
